items.summary: Eliminate the intermittent backend authorization/registration condition that causes Field creation to fail with the error text "User is not registered" for users who have successfully authenticated with Internet Identity.

Update frontend error normalization and UI behavior so that if Field creation fails with a "User is not registered"-type error, the app prompts the user to complete profile setup (instead of only showing a generic creation failure), using clear English user-facing text.

Add a regression check path (documentation and/or lightweight test coverage where this project already supports it) that reproduces the prior failure mode: login succeeds, then creating a Field intermittently fails with "User is not registered"; ensure the new build demonstrates the issue is fixed.
